title.narrative: Supporting displaced populations in the North-West and South-West regions of Cameroon through the implementation of the Displacement Tracking Matrix (DTM)

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to reduce risk of GBV and improve quality of response. This UNCHR project provides cash, legal and material assistance to GBV survivors, while enhancing community prevention and response against GBV. The project provides life-saving assistance to 16,846 people, including 8,453 women, 3,188 men, 5,749 children, and 1,732 persons with disabilities.
